issue.title: Sometimes image not loading

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android, AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

Android 3.6.10 (51)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.cafe.naver.com, https://cafe.naver.com, https://arca.live

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Adguard for Windows and android are all the same issues.
This problem continues with changes to mobile and PC devices.

Not all times.
Image loading failures often occur, and sometimes both PC and Android fail to load CSS, causing web pages to become unrecognizable.

At this time, everything worked fine when the Adguard filtering was turned off.

Most of them load correctly, but sometimes they don't and it doesn't seem to be a problem with the filter list.

</details>

comment.body:
Ads are already blocked by Chinese filter, please enable `AdGuard Chinese filter` and update filters.

Regarding this notice at the top, I'm not sure if it should be blocked, so please add this rule:
```adblock
ddys.tv##.hthb-pos--top
```
to user rules.

Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

labels.name: A: Waiting for data

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android, AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

Android 3.6.10 (51)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.cafe.naver.com, https://cafe.naver.com, https://arca.live

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Adguard for Windows and android are all the same issues.
This problem continues with changes to mobile and PC devices.

Not all times.
Image loading failures often occur, and sometimes both PC and Android fail to load CSS, causing web pages to become unrecognizable.

At this time, everything worked fine when the Adguard filtering was turned off.

Most of them load correctly, but sometimes they don't and it doesn't seem to be a problem with the filter list.

Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Screenshot_20221204-130810_Firefox_Beta](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44261958/205473958-8d1ff39e-b203-4eef-ad1d-9362455c7eb9.png)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
That's strange, but I noticed, that you have been using AdGuard for Safari on MacBook Air M2. I don't have it and checked on MacBook that's based on Intel CPU. Maybe it's issue with the app.
For instance, the top banner are removed by this rule `macrumors.com##.tertiary`. Can you add the rule to the User rules (you should also wait for the rule to be applied for ~ one minute) and check the site in private tab?
Do you have any rules for this site? Is it on allow list?

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.tumblr.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tumblr.com) ### Comment Username: @reazonozaer > When I have AdGuard on the site refuses to load in any way whatsoever. It just gets stuck in something like a reload loop. This only started happening today and was never an issue before. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Not an incorrect blocking. `AdGuard Widgets` (part of the `AdGuard Annoyances`) blocks third-party widgets, including feedback ones.
You can read about new filters https://adguard.com/en/blog/new-annoyance-filters.html there and swap `AdGuard Annoyances` to new ones without `AdGuard Widgets`.

issue.title: Sometimes image not loading
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android, AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

Android 3.6.10 (51)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.cafe.naver.com, https://cafe.naver.com, https://arca.live

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Adguard for Windows and android are all the same issues.
This problem continues with changes to mobile and PC devices.

Not all times.
Image loading failures often occur, and sometimes both PC and Android fail to load CSS, causing web pages to become unrecognizable.

At this time, everything worked fine when the Adguard filtering was turned off.

Most of them load correctly, but sometimes they don't and it doesn't seem to be a problem with the filter list.

Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Screenshot_20221204-130810_Firefox_Beta](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44261958/205473958-8d1ff39e-b203-4eef-ad1d-9362455c7eb9.png)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Nie potrafię odtworzyć tego problemu jeśli włączę tylko `AdGuard Base` i `Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard`.
Problem może powodować lista `AdGuard Annoyances filter` albo jakakolwiek inna lista w której znajduje się reguła z `dobreprogramy.pl#%#//scriptlet("prevent-addEventListener"[...]`, co jest związane z tym problemem - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/Scriptlets/issues/266

This report is the perplexing and confounded result of uBlock Filters **and** EasyList refusing to include entries for small-language sites as per https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/15896, and uBO's years-long refusal to enable AdGuard Base Filter by default despite the latter's strong regional coverage. ### Screenshots

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [X] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/64370
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/28832
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/13544
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/50751
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/52115
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/21105
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/19508
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/47048
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/27954
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/14925
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/16016
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/6302
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/48070
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/60821
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/35672
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/20513

### Add your comment and screenshots

 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/64370, https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/28832 and https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/13544 - No such elements found and resolved by List-KR filter.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/50751 and https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/52115 - No similar elements or requests found.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/21105 - Resolved by List-KR filer and `HTMLElement.offsetHeight` value of `.ebay-ad` is 0.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/19508 - No such elements found.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/47048 - The website is dead. You will be redirected to other website.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/27954 - No such elements found.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/14925 - The website is dead.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/16016 - The UI of the website was updated.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/6302 - The website is dead.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/48070 - Cannot find the anti-adblock script.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/60821 - The website is dead.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/35672 - Low visitors. And, The anti-adblock does not appear even if the request is blocked and the scriptlet rules are disabled.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/20513 - Low visitors. And, cannot find the anti-adblock script.

### Terms

- [X] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
On my end these rules works:
```adblock
||cloudfront.net/?rwlrd=$redirect=noopframe,domain=bowfile.com
||pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js$script,xmlhttprequest,redirect=googlesyndication-adsbygoogle,domain=bowfile.com,important
```

comment.body:
Alternative solution with scriptlets:
```adblock
bowfile.com#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'adsbygoogle.loaded', 'true')
bowfile.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-element-src-loading', 'iframe', 'cloudfront.net/?')
bowfile.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-element-src-loading', 'script', 'pagead2.googlesyndication.com')
bowfile.com#%#//scriptlet('abort-current-inline-script', 'Promise', 'continue;}break;}}else')
```

comment.body: Just to note on my above report: while most of my tabs use Adguard's SSL Cert, I noticed the NY Times is somehow bypassing Adguard's cert and using Digicert instead which may be why the ads are appearing. And just to confirm, no, nytimes is not on any bypass list and in fact the Adguard extension says "Protection is Enabled" and shows the green button is on yet it's using Digicert not Adguard for SSL.

comment.body:
If I'm not wrong, this rule:
```adblock
msn.com#%#(()=>{window.Element.prototype.attachShadow=new Proxy(window.Element.prototype.attachShadow,{apply:(a,b,c)=>{const d=Reflect.apply(a,b,c),e=new CSSStyleSheet;return e.replaceSync("#entry-point-hp-wc-banner, .me-stripe-title-subtitle, #displayAdCard, a[href*=\".booking.com/\"], a[href^=\"https://amzn.to/\"] { display: none !important; } #entry-point-hp-wc-header[style^=\"top:\"] { top: 0 !important; } #entry-point-hp-wc-root-wrapper[style^=\"margin-top:\"] { margin-top: 0 !important; } "),d.adoptedStyleSheets=[e],d}})})();
```
should hide these ads.

issue.title: www.kvsupply.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.kvsupply.com/item/cytopoint-injectable/PX101044/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.kvsupply.com%2Fitem%2Fcytopoint-injectable%2FPX101044%2F) ### Comment > When I right click on the page to use Adguard to block the ads that pop up, it does not function as it normally would and allow me to select the items on the page to block. this is the only site so far that this has occurred on. This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: app.clickup.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://app.clickup.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapp.clickup.com%2F) ### Comment > Hi there, thanks in advance for your help. So I'm having this issue where I can't use ClickUp with AdGuard enabled. This started happening around 1 month ago. I created a rule for AdGuard to ignore ClickUp, but it's useless. As long as AdGuard is enabled, ClickUp does not work. I also noticed that sometimes, if I disable the DNS protection, ClickUp works. But it's not consistent. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
